description: This Dashboard provides a detailled overview of a Linux system. You need a custom telegraf script to get the "Disk IO utilization (%)" working.

targets.query: SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "sysstat_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "sysstat_mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/
SELECT max("used_percent") FROM "sysstat_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND time >= now() - 5m GROUP BY "path" LIMIT 2
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_nice") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_irq") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_softirq") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_nice") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "sysstat_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "sysstat_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "sysstat_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "sysstat_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(ioutils) as "IO utils" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "  [%used]" FROM "sysstat_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("inodes_free") FROM "sysstat_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(ioutils) as "IO utils" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),60s) as "read" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),60s) as "write" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),60s) as "read" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT difference(mean("read_bytes")) FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Server$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("write_bytes")) FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),60s) as "read" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),60s) as "write" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),60s) as "read" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),60s) as "write" FROM "sysstat_diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$Server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "recv" FROM "sysstat_net" WHERE host =~ /$Server/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "sent" FROM "sysstat_net" WHERE host =~ /$Server/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s) as "sent" FROM "sysstat_net" WHERE host =~ /$Server/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s) as "in"  FROM "sysstat_net" WHERE host =~ /$Server/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), * fill(none)

list.name: Server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sysstat_system" WITH KEY=host

list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sysstat_diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$Server/

title: Telegraf  Sysstat
